text: Chammak Chandra is an Indian comedian and actor, known for the Jabardast comedy show. Chandra was born in Venkatapur in Nizamabad, Telangana. He made his film debut in the Teja movie Jai. Later he performed skits with actor Dhanraj and Venu and earned the attention of producer Mallemala. He found an opportunity in performing in the Jabardast comedy show. He entered Kollywood by appearing in the Tamil film Seyal. ==Controversy== Actress Swathi Naidu criticized Chandra in a video stating that he was exploiting girls for sexual favors by telling them he would offer them a chance in the show Jabardast. == Filmography == {| class="wikitable sortable" |- style="text-align:center;" !
